mapper.select: SELECT a.vendorId,sum(a.consumeAmount) staticConsumeAmount FROM ( SELECT a.vendorId,a.cost * sum(a.amount) consumeAmount FROM qyfinance.VendorHistoryBill a GROUP BY a.vendorId,a.cost ) a WHERE a.vendorId IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.vendorId

SELECT b.vendorId,sum(a.totleCost) currMonthRealTimeConsume FROM ( SELECT a.apiId,sum(a.totleCost) totleCost FROM qyfinance.ApiCostDayCount a WHERE a.consuTime >= #{currMonthTime} GROUP BY a.apiId ) a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_Api b ON a.apiId = b.id GROUP BY b.vendorId

SELECT b.vendorId,sum(a.cost) currDayRealTimeConsume FROM ( SELECT a.apiId,sum(b.cost) cost FROM qyfinance.finance_ApiRequestLog a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_ApiResponseLog b ON a.id = b.requestLogId WHERE b.ok = 1 AND b.isMock = 0 AND b.createTime >= #{currDayTime} GROUP BY a.apiId ) a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_Api b ON a.apiId = b.id GROUP BY b.vendorId

SELECT a.id apiId,a.apiTypeId,a.vendorId,b.name apiTypeName,d.id stid,d.name stidName FROM qyfinance.finance_Api a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiType b ON a.apiTypeId = b.id LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiMobileOperator c ON a.id = c.apiId LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwMobileOperator d ON c.mobileOperatorId = d.id WHERE a.vendorId = #{param}
SELECT DISTINCT a.yearMonth FROM qyfinance.VendorHistoryBill a ORDER BY year DESC,month DESC
